channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kaltura acquires eSelf, founded by creator of Snap’s AI, in $27M deal
item.description: Kaltura acquires AI avatar startup eSelf to integrate generative AI into enterprise video and learning tools.

item.title: The EPA Is in Chaos
item.description: “We learn who is furloughed when we send an email to someone and get the out-of-office message,” one employee tells WIRED.

item.title: AI PowerPoint-killer Gamma hits $2.1B valuation, $100M ARR, founder says
item.description: Gamma is growing quickly, and profitably, its co-founder CEO Grant Lee says.

item.title: A better way of thinking about the AI bubble
item.description: AI isn't all or nothing, and even good bets can turn sour if you aren't careful about how you make them.

item.title: If the US Has to Build Data Centers, Here’s Where They Should Go
item.description: A new analysis tries to calculate the coming environmental footprint of AI in the US and finds that the ideal sites for data centers aren’t where they...

item.title: Google brings Gemini to the Google TV Streamer
item.description: The tech giant says the change will enable users to use their voice more naturally to access content and more.

item.title: This Bluetooth Speaker Is Also a Charging Hub, and It’s Discounted to $130
item.description: I’m at the Bluetooth speaker. I’m at the power bank. I’m at the combination Bluetooth speaker and power bank.

item.title: Asus ProArt P16 Review: The Fastest Windows Laptop
item.description: This just might be the fastest Windows laptops on the market. Don’t ask about the price.

item.title: Rad Power Bikes faces shutdown in January without new funding
item.description: The company is "still fighting to find ways to continue" according to an email viewed by TechCrunch.

item.title: The First Radio Signal From Comet 3I/Atlas Ends the Debate About Its Nature
item.description: An observatory detected the first radio signal from the interstellar object 3I/Atlas. Here’s what it means.
